resources.string: CodeMessaging.net
Full-featured department messaging platform for routing dispatches anywhere and getting alerts out to responders FAST!

Send and display your department"'"s dispatches on any device and monitor responder status in real-time with Response Check. Users can login and send messages within the department as well as manage their own profile to route dispatches to any device (phones, pagers, tablets, computers, televisions, etc). CodeMessaging.net specializes in bringing control of dispatching to the department and responder.
Active 911
Live response tracking and mapping

Active911 provides a host of services for smartphones, cell phones, and tablets:
 - REAL TIME monitoring of response efforts
 - LIVE mapping of your entire crew as they respond
 - Detailed report generation
 - Works on iPhone, Android, Blackberry, and more
 - 2 way messaging to provide your crew with supplemental information

Google says that your phone does not currently support push notifications. And does not give us any hints as just what might be wrong. More often than not, simply repeating the request a few seconds or few days later will work, so try this a couple times before giving up and using the Email the Developer support feature to ask for help.
Google says that your phone does not currently support push notifications. And we do not really know why. Please use the Cadpage Email the Developer setting to ask for additional assistance.
The system is rejecting requests to view a web page. It would seem that you do not have any kind of web browser app installed.
